bt.dht

Interface DHTService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MldhtService

    public interface DHTService
    Provides an interface to DHT services
    Since:
    1.1

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addNode(Peer node)
      Add a DHT node.
      Stream<Peer> getPeers(Torrent torrent)
      Deprecated. 
      since 1.3 in favor of getPeers(TorrentId)
      Stream<Peer> getPeers(TorrentId torrentId)
      Creates a peer lookup for a given torrent.

    • Method Detail

      • getPeers

        Stream<Peer> getPeers(Torrent torrent)
        Deprecated. since 1.3 in favor of getPeers(TorrentId)
        Creates a peer lookup for a given torrent. Blocks the caller thread if the DHT services are unavailable at the moment of calling.
        Returns:
        Stream of peers. Retrieval of the next element might block. The stream ends when the current lookup is exhausted.
        Since:
        1.1

      • getPeers

        Stream<Peer> getPeers(TorrentId torrentId)
        Creates a peer lookup for a given torrent. Blocks the caller thread if the DHT services are unavailable at the moment of calling.
        Returns:
        Stream of peers. Retrieval of the next element might block. The stream ends when the current lookup is exhausted.
        Since:
        1.3

      • addNode

        void addNode(Peer node)
        Add a DHT node.
        Parameters:
        node - DHT node
        Since:
        1.1
